channel.title: Realistically on Thread Recap
channel.description: Recent content in Realistically on Thread Recap

item.title: December 2019 Set 2
item.description: December 2019 Set 2 Squadron 42: 2019 Visual Teaser Ship assets on a pretty background. Gameplay not included. Merry Christmas, bring money. Zero examples of a functioning game or story, but hey there are some scenery renders. CIG’s development in a nutshell. spinning models in a model viewer seems like the most perfect way to represent the state of the project and its future.
